original_text: When God chooses to remove wicked people, they cannot hope for any good thing. God will cause them to die. When God chooses to remove wicked people,
korean_text: 불경건한 자가 이익을 얻었으나 하나님이 그의 영혼을 거두실 때에는 무슨 희망이 있으랴

sentences.original_text: When God chooses to remove wicked people
they cannot hope for any good thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떤 좋은 것도 바랄 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: God will cause them to die
When God chooses to remove wicked people
